src_original: tatra katamadbahirdhā-sattvaparipākamārabhya ṣaḍvidhamupāyakauśalyam /  yenopāyakauśalyena bodhisattvaḥ parāttāni kuśalamūlāni apramāṇaphalatāyāmupanayati /  tathālpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni samāvartayatyupasaṃharati /  tathā buddhaśāsanapratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātamapanayati /  madhyasthānavatārayati /
tgt_original: 教化眾生善巧方便略有六種。

src_original: avatīrṇān paripācayati /  paripakvān vimocayati /  kathañca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ parīttāni kuśalamūlāni apramāṇaphalatāyāmupanayati /
tgt_original: 一能令有情以少善根感無量果。

src_original: iha bodhisattvo yat kiṃcit sattvaṃ pratyavaramapi vastvantataḥ saktuprasṛtaṃ pratyavara  eva kṣetre pradāpayati antatastiryagyonigate 'pi parīttaṃ tacca prāṇibhūte dāpayitvā
tgt_original: 謂勸有情捨微少物乃至最下唯一󰉓團。 施鄙穢田乃至蠢動傍生之類。

src_original: evaṃ tatkuśalamūlaṃ vastuto 'pi kṣetrato 'pi parīttaṃ tacca pariṇāmanā-vaśenāpramāṇaphalatayāmupanītaṃ bhavati
tgt_original: 如是善根物田雖下。 由迴向力感無量果。

src_original: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa vipulānyapramāṇāni kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayati /
tgt_original: 二能令有情小用功力引攝廣大無量善根。
又緣十方受苦有情願自代受。 又以意樂禮佛法僧。

src_original: punaratītapratyutpannāni sarva-skhalitāni sarvavyatikramāṃśca kalyāṇena śikṣākāmānugatena cetasā sarvadikṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike pratideśayati  tatraiva ca parān samādāpayati /
tgt_original: 又於過現一切違犯。 以淨意樂想對諸佛。 至誠發露誨往修來。

src_original: tasyaivamabhīkṣṇaṃ skhalitaṃ pratideśayataḥ sarvakarmāvaraṇebhyo vimokṣo bhavatyalpakṛcchreṇa /
tgt_original: 如是數數小用功力。 一切業障皆得解脫。
四處中有情令其趣入。 五已入令熟。
